item.title: 3 Trends in E-Commerce Product Discovery
item.description: In my previous article, I highlighted what fundamental functionalities companies need to offer to their customers in order to achieve a good customer experience of their e-commerce offering. In this article, I will share what I believe customers expect from Search & Merchandising capabilities in e-commerce, both today and in the future, in times of ever faster digitalisation and shortened technology development cycles. Innovative technologies open up new opportunities to address potential customers, through both existing and new channels.
